Package org.neo4j.dbms.database

Interface DatabaseManager<DB extends DatabaseContext>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Lifecycle
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDatabaseManager, DefaultDatabaseManager
    public interface DatabaseManager<DB extends DatabaseContext>
extends Lifecycle

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.neo4j.kernel.lifecycle.Lifecycle

        init, shutdown, start, stop

    • Method Detail

      • initialiseSystemDatabase

        default void initialiseSystemDatabase()
        Creates the system database. This must be created and started before any other databases can be created. If the system database is already initialised, nothing happens

      • initialiseDefaultDatabase

        default void initialiseDefaultDatabase()
        Creates those databases which are required by default in a Neo4j install as per the system Config. If default databases are already initialised, nothing happens

      • getDatabaseContext

        Optional<DB> getDatabaseContext​(NamedDatabaseId namedDatabaseId)
        Returns a given DatabaseContext object by identifier, or `Optional.empty()` if the database does not exist
        Parameters:
        namedDatabaseId - the ID of the database to be returned
        Returns:
        optionally, the database context instance with ID databaseId

      • getDatabaseContext

        default Optional<DB> getDatabaseContext​(String databaseName)
        Returns a given DatabaseContext object by name, or `Optional.empty()` if the database does not exist
        Parameters:
        databaseName - the name of the database to be returned
        Returns:
        optionally, the database context instance with name databaseName

      • getDatabaseContext

        default Optional<DB> getDatabaseContext​(DatabaseId databaseId)
        Returns a given DatabaseContext object by name, or `Optional.empty()` if the database does not exist
        Parameters:
        databaseId - the identifier of the database to be returned
        Returns:
        optionally, the database context instance with identifier databaseId

      • createDatabase

        DB createDatabase​(NamedDatabaseId namedDatabaseId)
           throws DatabaseManagementException
        Create database with specified name. Database name should be unique. By default a database is in a started state when it is initially created.
        Parameters:
        namedDatabaseId - ID of database to create
        Returns:
        database context for newly created database
        Throws:
        DatabaseManagementException - if database with specified name already exists, or the limited number of databases has been reached.

      • dropDatabase

        void dropDatabase​(NamedDatabaseId namedDatabaseId)
           throws DatabaseNotFoundException
        Drop database with specified name. Database that was requested to be dropped will be stopped first, and then completely removed. If database with requested name does not exist exception will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        namedDatabaseId - ID of database to drop.
        Throws:
        DatabaseNotFoundException

      • upgradeDatabase

        default void upgradeDatabase​(NamedDatabaseId namedDatabaseId)
                      throws DatabaseNotFoundException
        Upgrade database with specified name. The database will be restarted if it is running.
        Parameters:
        namedDatabaseId - ID of database to upgrade.
        Throws:
        DatabaseNotFoundException - if there is no database by the given name.

      • stopDatabase

        void stopDatabase​(NamedDatabaseId namedDatabaseId)
           throws DatabaseNotFoundException
        Stop database with specified name. Stopping already stopped database does not have any effect.
        Parameters:
        namedDatabaseId - database ID to stop
        Throws:
        DatabaseNotFoundException

      • startDatabase

        void startDatabase​(NamedDatabaseId namedDatabaseId)
            throws DatabaseNotFoundException
        Start database with specified name. Starting already started database does not have any effect.
        Parameters:
        namedDatabaseId - database ID to start
        Throws:
        DatabaseNotFoundException

      • registeredDatabases

        SortedMap<NamedDatabaseId,​DB> registeredDatabases()
        Return all DatabaseContext instances created by this service, associated with their database names. The collection returned from this method must be an immutable view over the registered database and sorted by database name.
        Returns:
        a Map from database names to database objects.

      • databaseIdRepository

        DatabaseIdRepository.Caching databaseIdRepository()
        Return the DatabaseIdRepository.Caching constructed with this database manager. Use this to retrieve a NamedDatabaseId for a given database name.
        Returns:
        database ID repository for use with this database manager
